content: earburn ear-warmer/headband pattern by mindy abodeely of minuet knit materials - 1 skein of ella rae lush or approx 50 yards/46 meters of super bulky yarn - size us 11/8mm 16 circular needle - darning needle - 1 stitch marker or a few if you tend to lose them gauge 11 sts & 16 row to 4 inches/10cm round 1 k all sts round 2 *k1 p1* repeated starred to bor m abbreviations - k = knit - p = purl - co = cast on - bobble = bind off - round s = round s - st s = stitch es - bor = beginning of round - m = marker pattern co 56 sts set-up round place a marker to indicate the bor join for work in the round by knitting into the first st of your co being careful not to twist the co sts *k1 p1* repeat starred to bor m round 1 k all sts round 2 *k1 p1* repeated starred to bor m repeat rnds 1 & 2 until work measures approximately 3 inches/8cm from co edge ending with a round 2 bobble in k1 p1 pattern weave in ends block if desired enjoy don t forget to post your project on ravelry i love seeing all of the finished projects
